divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister told me she had seen with husband and two kids the UfO yesterday --- she is not familiar with internet, so I wanted to report instead of her. Anyway, they live literally in the forest without too many neigbours...but UFO was seen by many others and even videotaped by someone - a little further from where my family lives. It was even in the news, but obviously they say that it was some kind of spacecraft from NASA...hehe, in this remote area, in Hungary...well, the younger son of my sis told by watching the object: ah yes, it is only a ufo - you dont need to be afraid...meanwhile the bigger was a bit scared. Anyway, the object moved on very fast, so that was it.
Summary: They were outside with the kids for snowballing, etc...and had seen a star-like UFO, moving fast and being very light!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Vámospércs
This sighting has never been favorited.
